thread.title: Michael Cloutman

author: Michael Cloutman
title: Michael Cloutman
text: Bike Tires Direct is stocked with what most cyclists want, whether it's from bells and whistles, to bike lights, foul weather gear, quality brand names such as LG, Castelli, Craft, and other vendors. Bike tires are well stocked, along with shoes, gloves, protective shoe booties, components, brakes,helmets, and a vast selection for everything related to cycling. I like the fact that with purchasing cycling gear customers can earn "rebates" and save money by applying credits toward purchases.
